venue.name: Newport County Convention and Visitors Bureau

item.description:
Quick question: What would you most want to do on a cold November morning at the tail end of a three day weekend?  If you answered run for 4.2 miles, have I got a deal for you!

Join me on a 4.2 mile run across the beautifully scenic Newport Bridge as we run from Jamestown to Newport.  The bridge has rarely been open to pedestrian traffic so this will be a real treat!

Don't worry if you're not a runner - I've never even competed in a 3 mile run.

There is an entrance fee (money goes to local charities), and you'll get a long sleeved shirt just for entering.  The fee goes up the longer you wait ($40 if you register by June), so sign up soon!

﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿http://www.citizensbridgerun.com/info/index.html﻿﻿

Please note: Time is approximate (I will adjust it as time grows closer).  There will be a free shuttle service from Newport to the starting point in Jamestown before the race (I'll be taking the shuttle).
item.name: 4.2 mile run across Newport Bridge
